Reviews.Title: Very bad quality
Reviews.Author: Naim N Boueri
Reviews.Content: All four IP cameras are not operational. The NVR is working fine. Still waiting for a replacement from the supplier.

Reviews.Title: It's okay
Reviews.Author: Alejandro Llorente
Reviews.Content: It's okay but was very hard to set up, I hope they develop an easier way to find the IP addresses

Reviews.Title: Security Camera's
Reviews.Author: Very Disatisfied
Reviews.Content: This product is not user friendly. It doesn't give clear instructions on what is needed to support its use.  I had a total system failure of the product and am still waiting for my refund 2 months later.  The 2nd set of camera's has been a lot of headaches and expense to get supporting infra-structure, meantime I have had a stalker continually breaking into my residents.  I would recommend calling your local security company and leaving the headaches to them.

Reviews.Title: Not easy installation due old software and lack of support
Reviews.Author: Larry
Reviews.Content: We got the packages and it includes a big text:"24/7 support"; but when you call them you'll notice nobody anwser the phone...The other point is that its software does not work with Internet Explorer 9 or 10; you will need an OLD Internet Explorer 8 to be able to get it running...What more? You will need to update your router network segment to the initial setup of the cameras...
